description: This easy roast pumpkin soup recipe is on the table in just 20 minutes. With only five ingredients, it's the ultimate midweek dinner.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Pumpkin,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Vegan,Dinner Made Easy,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Easy Roasted Pumpkin & Sweet Potato Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch coriander, roots and stems finely chopped, leaves picked and roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220° fan-forced. Line 2 large trays with baking paper. Divide pumpkin and sweet potato mix between trays. Drizzle with oil and season with pepper. Toss to coat. Roast for 12 minutes or until just tender and starting to brown.
Meanwhile, bring stock, 3/4 of coconut milk, coriander roots and stems to the boil in a large saucepan over high heat. Boil for 5 minutes or until reduced by a third.

Add pumpkin and sweet potato mixture. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 3 minutes or until vegetables are heated through. Remove from heat. Using a stick blender, blend soup until smooth.
Ladle soup among bowls. Drizzle with remaining coconut milk and swirl to create a marble effect. Top with chopped coriander leaves and serve.
